2025-01-28.title: Siemens Energy Raises Cash Flow Guidance After Strong Start
2025-01-28.description: Siemens Energy AG increased its cash flow outlook for the year after beating analysts’ revenue and profit estimates in its first quarter.

2025-01-20.title: Sparkle Clean Tech Licenses Oil & Gas Water Treatment Technologies from Siemens Energy, Inc.

2025-02-12.title: Siemens Energy Sees Electricity Boom Driving Growth
2025-02-12.description: Siemens Energy AG expects rising electricity demand and the shift to renewable energy to drive growth this year after posting a record order backlog in the last quarter.

2025-03-06.title: Siemens announces $285 investment in US manufacturing
2025-03-06.description: LOS ANGELES (AP) — Siemens plans to invest $285 million in manufacturing in the United States, the tech company said Thursday, including two new facilities in California and Texas. The U.S. is the largest market for the company. The recent investments in the …
